verses.roman:
tāra madhye rāghavera jhāli-vivaraṇa
tāra madhye pari-muṇḍā-nṛtya-kathana

synonyms: tāra madhye—in the midst of that; rāghavera—of Rāghava Paṇḍita; jhāli-vivaraṇa—description of the bags of food; tāra madhye—along with that; pari-muṇḍā-nṛtya-kathana—the description of dancing in the temple of Jagannātha.
translation: In the midst of that narration are descriptions of Rāghava Paṇḍita's bags of food and the dancing in the temple of Jagannātha.
